Id.description: Unique string. It is desirable to match the folder name.

Version.description: Need for dependent mods and to check for updates.

ManagerVersion.description: Minimum required version of the mod manager. (Recommended)

Requirements.description: Minimum required version of mods or just other required mod.

AssemblyName.description: Filename we are creating. Default like 'Id' (e.g. TestMod.dll).

EntryMethod.description: A function that will be called by the mod manager at load game.

Repository.description: Web address to check for updates.
